price: Dájúdájú àmì (fèyíkọ́gbọ́n) wà nínú ìyẹn fún ẹnikẹ́ni tó páyà ìyà Ọjọ́ Ìkẹ́yìn. Ìyẹn ni ọjọ́ tí A óò kó àwọn ènìyàn jọ fún. Àti pé ìyẹn ni ọjọ́ tí gbogbo ẹ̀dá yóò fojú rí.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan liman khāfa ʿadhāba al-ākhirati dhālika yawmun majmūʿun lahu al-nāsu wadhālika yawmun mashhūdun
